ROOT:
-- DaoEmployees_D3_Update -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Employees] SET
[EmployeeID] = @Set_EmployeeID_forUPD, [LastName] = @Set_LastName_forUPD, [FirstName] = @Set_FirstName_forUPD, [Title] = @Set_Title_forUPD, [TitleOfCourtesy] = @Set_TitleOfCourtesy_forUPD, [BirthDate] = @Set_BirthDate_forUPD, [HireDate] = @Set_HireDate_forUPD, [Address] = @Set_Address_forUPD, [City] = @Set_City_forUPD, [Region] = @Set_Region_forUPD, [PostalCode] = @Set_PostalCode_forUPD, [Country] = @Set_Country_forUPD, [HomePhone] = @Set_HomePhone_forUPD, [Extension] = @Set_Extension_forUPD, [Photo] = @Set_Photo_forUPD, [Notes] = @Set_Notes_forUPD, [ReportsTo] = @Set_ReportsTo_forUPD, [PhotoPath] = @Set_PhotoPath_forUPD,
WHERE AND [EmployeeID] = @EmployeeIDAND [EmployeeID] IS NULL AND [LastName] = @LastNameAND [LastName] IS NULL AND [FirstName] = @FirstNameAND [FirstName] IS NULL AND [Title] = @TitleAND [Title] IS NULL AND [TitleOfCourtesy] = @TitleOfCourtesyAND [TitleOfCourtesy] IS NULL AND [BirthDate] = @BirthDateAND [BirthDate] IS NULL AND [HireDate] = @HireDateAND [HireDate] IS NULL AND [Address] = @AddressAND [Address] IS NULL AND [City] = @CityAND [City] IS NULL AND [Region] = @RegionAND [Region] IS NULL AND [PostalCode] = @PostalCodeAND [PostalCode] IS NULL AND [Country] = @CountryAND [Country] IS NULL AND [HomePhone] = @HomePhoneAND [HomePhone] IS NULL AND [Extension] = @ExtensionAND [Extension] IS NULL AND [Photo] = @PhotoAND [Photo] IS NULL AND [Notes] = @NotesAND [Notes] IS NULL AND [ReportsTo] = @ReportsToAND [ReportsTo] IS NULL AND [PhotoPath] = @PhotoPathAND [PhotoPath] IS NULL
